Projects.title: Constructor Word Guess - Node App
Projects.summary:
Play along with this word guess game that uses Latin America country names. 

 This command-line game that uses JavaScript constructor functions. Use the GitHub repo and follow the instructions to run the game on your terminal.

Projects.title: LIRI - Node App
Projects.summary: LIRI is like iPhone's SIRI. However, while SIRI is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface, LIRI is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. LIRI will be a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data.
